water_pokemon.name: Azumarill
water_pokemon.description: By keeping still and listening intently, it can tell what is in even wild, fast-moving rivers.

water_pokemon.name: Feraligatr
water_pokemon.description: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up

water_pokemon.name: Chinchou
water_pokemon.description: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.

fire_pokemon.name: Typhlosion
fire_pokemon.description: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

fire_pokemon.name: Houndoom
fire_pokemon.description: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

fire_pokemon.name: Magcargo
fire_pokemon.description: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.

normal_pokemon.name: Furret
normal_pokemon.description: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.

normal_pokemon.name: Noctowl
normal_pokemon.description: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

normal_pokemon.name: Aipom
normal_pokemon.description: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

normal_pokemon.name: Ursaring
normal_pokemon.description: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.

electric_pokemon.name: Pichu
electric_pokemon.description: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

electric_pokemon.name: Flaaffy
electric_pokemon.description: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.

electric_pokemon.name: Ampharos
electric_pokemon.description: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

grass_pokemon.name: Bayleef
grass_pokemon.description: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.

grass_pokemon.name: Bellossom
grass_pokemon.description: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

grass_pokemon.name: Sunkern
grass_pokemon.description: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.

ice_pokemon.name: Piloswine
ice_pokemon.description: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

ice_pokemon.name: Delibird
ice_pokemon.description: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.

ice_pokemon.name: Smoochum
ice_pokemon.description: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.

fighting_pokemon.name: Hitmontop
fighting_pokemon.description: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.

fighting_pokemon.name: Tyrogue
fighting_pokemon.description: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

fighting_pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
fighting_pokemon.description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position

poison_pokemon.name: Ariados
poison_pokemon.description: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.

poison_pokemon.name: Qwilfish
poison_pokemon.description: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.

poison_pokemon.name: Crobat
poison_pokemon.description: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

ground_pokemon.name: Gligar
ground_pokemon.description: It flies straight at its target's face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

ground_pokemon.name: Piloswine
ground_pokemon.description: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

ground_pokemon.name: Donphan
ground_pokemon.description: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house

flying_pokemon.name: Hoothoot
flying_pokemon.description: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

flying_pokemon.name: Noctowl
flying_pokemon.description: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

flying_pokemon.name: Togetic
flying_pokemon.description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

psychic_pokemon.name: Espeon
psychic_pokemon.description: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy's actions.

psychic_pokemon.name: Unown
psychic_pokemon.description: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

psychic_pokemon.name: Wobbuffet
psychic_pokemon.description: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.

bug_pokemon.name: Pineco
bug_pokemon.description: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.

bug_pokemon.name: Ledian
bug_pokemon.description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

bug_pokemon.name: Scizor
bug_pokemon.description: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.

rock_pokemon.name: Sudowoodo
rock_pokemon.description: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.

rock_pokemon.name: Corsola
rock_pokemon.description: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

rock_pokemon.name: Shuckle
rock_pokemon.description: The Berries it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.

ghost_pokemon.name: Misdreavous
ghost_pokemon.description: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.

dragon_pokemon.name: Kingdra
dragon_pokemon.description: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

dark_pokemon.name: Umbreon
dark_pokemon.description: When agitated, this Pokémon protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores

dark_pokemon.name: Murkrow
dark_pokemon.description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

dark_pokemon.name: Houndour
dark_pokemon.description: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

steel_pokemon.name: Steelix
steel_pokemon.description: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.

steel_pokemon.name: Forretress
steel_pokemon.description: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.

steel_pokemon.name: Skarmory
steel_pokemon.description: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
